summary: Experience in C, C++ and C# programming with working knowledge of Agile, Jira and Git. Skilled in Windows, AIX and Linux system administration; TCP/IP and SSL knowledge; strong understanding of the software development lifecycle, debugging and code analysis; experience in system programming and UNIX shell scripting; UI development; knowledge of software security concepts and application compliance with security standards; interested in cross-platform development; pursuing advanced studies in computer science (neural networks).
